title: player
body: Why did I create a PBE account but when I entered it only gave 8000 RP

replies.body: PBE has a daily stipend that refreshes every day around noon.  You'll have to wait for the next day to get a restock of currency, but hit up the [PBE boards](http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/) if you have any concerns or feedback.
